page.title: Use a wallet to keep LikeCoin
page.description: After binding your wallet to Liker ID, you may:
bullet: Free to use LikeCoin transfer service
Earn LikeCoin by joining "Reinventing the Like" ecosystem

page.title: Wallet is kept by you
description: Note that we are only binding your wallet address. We do have have access to your private key and are not able to access your wallet.
You have to backup your seed phrase and be responsible for your wallet. If you lose the seed phrase, we will not be able to help recover since you are the only one who has access.

page.title: Keep your wallet safe
description: If you transfer your LikeCoin through ours or other services, once the transaction has been ordered, we are unable to void it.
Once a wallet has been created, it stays in the Ethereum, we are unable to suspend or delete it.

gettingStart.title: Getting Start
gettingStart.description: Welcome to join the movement. LikeCoin aims to reinvent the Like by realigning creativity and reward. In like.co, you are not only can buy and send LikeCoin, but also earn LikeCoin by participating in the LIKE ecology. View your Like ID payment page, watch introduction video and join our telegram group to get 3 LikeCoin!
gettingStart.taskOnepager: Take a look at our one pager
gettingStart.taskPaymentPage: Take a look at your payment page

inviteFriend.title: Invite a friend to join LikeCoin
inviteFriend.description: Invite friend (or friends) to join us, 8 LIKE for both you and your friends.

joinTokenSale.title: Join Token Sale
joinTokenSale.description: Join token sale now and get 100 LIKE bonus
joinTokenSale.subDescription:
And don't forget the referral bonus, it can be huge! Every time you participate in token sale, you and your referrer will both get 2.5% additional token bonus too, NO UPPER LIMIT!

Note: If you join the token sale through third parties, e.g. MyEthShop, this mission will not be completed. As a result, you will not get bonus for this mission.

integratedPlatform.title: {name} – Provide Liker ID to publishers
integratedPlatform.content: For creators publishing on Internet media such as {inmedia}, {standnews} and {citizenNews}, just provide your Liker ID to editor in charge and Like Rewards button will be attached to your posts. {setupWallet} and you shall receive income daily automatically.

wordpress.name: WordPress
wordpress.title: {name} – Install Like Rewards plugin
wordpress.content: {installWp} to enable new Like Rewards button in your posts by just one click. The plugin is nothing to do with client browser’s computational power, all you need are reader’s Likes. No annoying ads on the button, it is your own brand. {wpInstruction}
wordpress.caption: Like Rewards button will show on your post after installed the {plugin}

embedly.name: Matters / Medium / Vocus
embedly.title: {name} – Attach Like Rewards button yourself
embedly.content: For creators publishing on Matters, Medium and Vocus, you may embed Like Rewards button to your post using the link "{likeButtonUrl}". {setupWallet} and you shall receive income daily automatically.
embedly.caption: Simply type the link and press ‘Enter’ in the editor

oice.title: {name} - Connect with Liker ID
oice.content: Bind your Liker ID in {oiceWebsite}. The LikeButton will appear automatically on your oice visual novel after you have bind your Liker ID with your oice account. {oiceInstruction}
oice.caption: LikeButton will show aside with your story

title.earn: Every Like is a reward. Turn your Likes into actual income now.
title.slogan: Get Rewarded by Reader’s Likes NOW
title.minTitle: It's a snap to support creators

label.earn: Add the reinvented LikeButton to your creative contents to turn readers' Likes into passive income. Keep connected with your fans, promote your own brand with a nicely designed UI.
label.poc: With the focus on rewarding content creators, LikeCoin (LIKE) measures the "creativity" of creative contents and let creators make passive income in LIKE with their creative contents according to the Likes they get. We call the mechanism Proof of Creativity, or PoC.
label.campaign: Act immediately to earn LIKE by your creative works. There are three platforms that support the LikeButton now: WordPress-powered sites, Medium and oice.
label.enroll: Add the LikeButton to your creative works; get Likes from your fans. It’s that simple! We are giving out millions of LikeCoin per month to reward creators. Let’s go ahead for the bonus.
label.minLabel: Click on the LikeButton embedded in the creative works to reward the creators. A baby could do, but means a lot.

CivicLikerCTA.title: Civic Liker
CivicLikerCTA.content: Trade a coffee for a better world! Become a Civic Liker now, experience for 1-month-free to support creators by giving Likes, contruct a sustainable and healthy online content ecosystem.

CivicLikerCTAForWaitingList.content: We got your application before. Thanks for supporting Civic Liker. You are on the waiting list already Please {here} so that we can notify you once new seats are available.

CivicLikerCTAForPaid.content: You are a Civic Liker already, thank you for your contribution to help building a better world!

CivicLikerCTAForRenewal.content: Your Civic Liker identity has been expired. Please continue your subscription now to retain your honorable status. The online content ecology need your continuous contribution to become stronger.

CivicPage.title: Civic Liker
CivicPage.slogan: Trade a coffee for a better world

waitingList.notifyByEmail: We will notify you in email as soon as available.

intro1: Have you ever read a great story, detailed news coverage or beautiful picture on the web, wanted to micro reward it but couldn't?
Have you realized creativity on the web brings no direct income, creators and civil reporters can only rely on ads, outsource projects and most importantly, enthusiasm?
Civic Liker is a movement to reward open contents. For the cost of a cup of coffee, you become a Civic Liker. Whatever you Like will then be turned into a tangible reward to creators.

intro2.title: Your interest, your taste
intro2.p: The US$5 paid monthly by a Civic Liker will be distributed to creators in full amount.* Which creators to support purely depends on the online contents you Like during the month, while the Foundation distributes the reward based on your taste. You may check the distribution of rewards any time down to a cent on our panel.

intro2.title: Benefiting from Giving
intro2.p: Other than supporting creators, Civic Likers enjoy various benefits such as taking part in community voting, accessing bonus contents, receiving newsletters from idols and joining offline events.

features.ownRewardPool: Distribute own reward pool with every Like

footnote: Depending on the payment method a Civic Liker picks, surcharge may apply by payment channels such as credit card gateway. The full amount received by the Foundation will be converted into LikeCoin for distribution to creators, and be converted by creators into currencies of their own countries. The Foundation charge no service fee.

credit.photo: Photos by Anthony Tran, Joe Gardner, KE ATLAS, Quentin Keller and Warren Wong
